3.
```{r}
yournum <- as.numeric(readline("Enter the starting number for fibonacci sequence: "))

a<-0
b<-1

cat("Fibonacci sequence starting from",yournum,"up to 500\n")
repeat{
  if(a>=yournum){
    cat(a," ")
  }
  if(a==377){
    break
  }
  numyours <- a+b
  a <- b
  b <- numyours
  
}
cat("\n")



```
